question: AYUSH Festival of Stamps 2017 was held at __________.
explanation: AYUSH Festival of Stamps 2017 was held at Panaji, Goa. It was inaugurated by Rajya Sabha MP Vinay Tendulkar at Maquinez Palace, Panaji, Goa. Its objective is to promote healthy hobbies such as stamp collection among students and healthy lifestyle habits. Stamps related to ayurveda, yoga and related traditional practices from India and abroad were displayed at the event. About 150 schools and 5,000 students participated in the festival.
